description: Test suite for the DeepSeek agent in the agno project, including unit tests for basic functionality, streaming, async operations, memory, response modeling, JSON mode, and history management.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: Pydantic model used for testing structured response content with title, genre, and plot fields.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: Helper function to assert that response metrics contain positive token counts and that total tokens equal the sum of input and output tokens.

methods.name: test_basic
methods.description: Tests the basic run method of the Agent with a simple prompt.

methods.name: test_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests the streaming response functionality of the Agent.

methods.name: test_async_basic
methods.description: Asynchronous test for the basic run method.

methods.name: test_with_memory
methods.description: Tests the Agent's ability to remember conversation history.

methods.name: test_response_model
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to return structured responses conforming to a Pydantic model.

methods.name: test_json_response_mode
methods.description: Tests the agent's JSON response mode with a Pydantic model.

methods.name: test_history
methods.description: Tests the history management and message storage in the agent.
